GSD.product_version: versions from v4.6 to before v4.19.267
GSD.description:
kcm: avoid potential race in kcm_tx_work

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.267 by commit 23a0a5869749c7833772330313ae7aec6581ec60, it was introduced in version v4.6 by commit ab7ac4eb9832e32a09f4e8042705484d2fb0aad3. For more details please see the references link.
